title.en: God Speaks and the World Begins

en: God creates by speaking—without struggle or rival.
The world begins with God’s purposeful word.

lines: God created the heavens and the earth.
God’s Spirit moved over the waters.
God said, “Let there be light,” and there was light.
God formed the world with order and purpose.

question.en: What do you notice about God in the way He creates?
